name: Diabetes
description: Chronic condition affecting blood sugar regulation.

name: Obesity
description: Excess body fat increasing health risk.

name: Hypertension
description: High blood pressure, risk for heart and kidney disease.

name: Heart Disease
description: Range of heart conditions including blocked blood vessels.

name: Coronary Artery Disease
description: Narrowing of arteries supplying blood to the heart.

name: Stroke
description: Reduced blood supply to the brain, medical emergency.

name: Chronic Kidney Disease
description: Gradual loss of kidney function.

name: Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease
description: Fat buildup in liver unrelated to alcohol.

name: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
description: Hormonal disorder causing enlarged ovaries.

name: Hyperlipidemia
description: High levels of lipids in the blood.

name: Insulin Resistance
description: Body's cells do not respond to insulin well.

name: Metabolic Syndrome
description: Cluster of conditions increasing heart disease risk.

name: Sleep Apnea
description: Breathing repeatedly stops and starts during sleep.

name: Gout
description: Form of arthritis with severe pain and swelling.

name: Thyroid Disorders
description: Diseases affecting thyroid hormone production.

name: Pancreatitis
description: Inflammation of the pancreas.

name: Depression
description: Mood disorder causing persistent sadness.

name: Anxiety
description: Disorders causing excessive nervousness or worry.

name: Chronic Inflammation
description: Long-term inflammation causing tissue damage.

name: Hypoglycemia
description: Low blood sugar levels.

name: Peripheral Neuropathy
description: Damage to nerves outside brain and spinal cord.

name: Retinopathy
description: Damage to retina, often from diabetes.

name: Nephropathy
description: Kidney disease or damage.

name: Foot Ulcers
description: Sores or wounds on the feet, often in diabetics.

name: Periodontal Disease
description: Infection of tissues around the teeth.

name: Cognitive Decline
description: Worsening of memory and thinking skills.

name: Alzheimer’s Disease
description: Progressive disease that destroys memory.

name: Osteoporosis
description: Weak and brittle bones.

name: Vitamin D Deficiency
description: Low levels of vitamin D in the body.

name: Insomnia
description: Difficulty falling or staying asleep.

name: Chronic Stress
description: Ongoing stress causing mental/physical health issues.

name: Erectile Dysfunction
description: Difficulty maintaining an erection.

name: PCOS-related Infertility
description: Infertility linked to polycystic ovary syndrome.

name: Gallbladder Disease
description: Diseases affecting the gallbladder.

name: Hemochromatosis
description: Too much iron in the body.

name: Autonomic Neuropathy
description: Damage to nerves that control involuntary functions.

name: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
description: Stomach acid frequently flows back into the esophagus.

name: Fatigue Syndrome
description: Persistent, unexplained fatigue.

name: Glaucoma
description: Group of eye conditions damaging the optic nerve.

name: Macular Degeneration
description: Eye disease that causes vision loss.

name: Chronic Migraines
description: Recurring severe headaches.

name: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
description: Extreme fatigue that doesn’t improve with rest.

name: Increased Blood Clotting Risk
description: Higher chance of abnormal blood clotting.

name: Reactive Hypoglycemia
description: Low blood sugar after eating.

name: Diabetic Dermopathy
description: Skin spots caused by changes in blood vessels.

name: Acanthosis Nigricans
description: Dark, thick skin patches, often in folds.

name: Chronic Pain
description: Long-lasting pain.

name: Skin Infections
description: Infections of the skin.

name: Bacterial Infections
description: Infections caused by bacteria.

name: Urinary Tract Infections
description: Infections in any part of the urinary system.

name: Yeast Infections
description: Fungal infection caused by yeast.

name: Fungal Infections
description: Infections caused by fungi.

name: ADHD
description: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.

name: Liver Cirrhosis
description: Scarring of the liver tissue.

name: Insulinoma
description: A tumor in the pancreas producing insulin.

name: Cushing’s Syndrome
description: High cortisol levels over a long period.

name: Addison’s Disease
description: Adrenal glands don't produce enough hormones.

name: Anemia
description: Low red blood cell count.

name: Asthma
description: Condition in which airways narrow and swell.

name: COPD
description: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease.

name: High Cholesterol
description: High levels of cholesterol in the blood.

name: IBS
description: Irritable bowel syndrome.

name: Lactose Intolerance
description: Inability to digest lactose, a milk sugar.

name: Chronic Constipation
description: Difficulty passing stools or infrequent stools.

name: Nut Allergy
description: Allergic reaction to nuts. Avoid all nut products.

name: Shellfish Allergy
description: Allergic to shellfish. Avoid crustaceans and mollusks.

name: Egg Allergy
description: Egg allergy. Avoid all foods containing eggs.

name: Soy Allergy
description: Soy allergy. Avoid soy products and derivatives.

name: Gluten Sensitivity
description: Sensitivity to gluten. Avoid wheat, barley, and rye.

name: Lactose Intolerance
description: Inability to digest lactose, a milk sugar.

name: Celiac Disease
description: Autoimmune reaction to gluten. Strict gluten-free diet required.

name: Peanut Allergy
description: Allergic reaction to peanuts. Avoid all peanut products.

name: Obesity
description: Excess body fat increasing health risk.

name: Gout
description: Form of arthritis with severe pain and swelling.

name: Hypertension
description: High blood pressure, risk for heart and kidney disease.

name: Cardiovascular Disease
description: Disease of the heart and blood vessels.
